table.name: Cormanthor Encounters
table.caption: Cormanthor Encounters
rows: A healing spring lies in a grove sacred to elven gods. A creature that drinks from the spring regains {@dice 1d8} Hit Points but can benefit from the spring only once a day.
An abandoned animal den provides shelter.
A pack of {@dice 2d4} {@creature Wolf|XMM|Wolves} follows the party, ambushing the characters when they are distracted.
{@dice 1d6} {@creature Goblin Warrior|XMM|Goblin Warriors} riding {@creature Worg|XMM|Worgs} hunt for easy prey.
A {@creature Dryad|XMM} observes the party. If the characters respect the forest, the dryad approaches.
Two {@creature Displacer Beast|XMM|Displacer Beasts} ambush the party.
{@dice 2d4} {@creature Gnoll Warrior|XMM|Gnoll Warriors} prowl a dilapidated cabin with hidden treasure inside.
An elf {@creature Scout Captain|XMM} and {@dice 2d4} {@creature Scout|XMM|Scouts} patrol the forest and observe the party from hiding.
A {@creature Shambling Mound|XMM} created by {@book Moander's|FRAiF|2|Moander, God of Rot} corruption fights any living thing it sees.
The characters enter the territory of a {@creature Primeval Owlbear|XMM}. If left alone, it ignores them.
{@dice 3d6} {@creature Skeleton|XMM|Skeletons} climb from their mass grave and begin combat.
A {@creature Mage|XMM} with two {@creature Warrior Veteran|XMM} bodyguards search ruins for treasure. If the party looks vulnerable, they initiate combat.
The party has stumbled into the hunting ground of a {@creature Young Green Dragon|XMM}.
Ancient crypts are now home to a {@creature Ghast Gravecaller|XMM} and {@dice 2d6} {@creature Ghoul|XMM|Ghouls}.
The party enters a rotten grove where a {@creature Spore of Moander|FRAiF} grows.
A {@creature Nycaloth|XMM} leads {@dice 2d4} {@creature Mezzoloth|XMM|Mezzoloths} on a hunt.
A {@creature Lich|XMM} and {@dice 2d4} {@creature Death Cultist|XMM|Death Cultists} search the ruins for lost magical secrets.
A Zhentarim {@creature Assassin|XMM} hides from the law.
A tree warped by magic and corruption has become a {@creature Gulthias Blight|XMM}.
An elf {@creature Archmage|XMM} and {@creature Questing Knight|XMM} are trying to recover a family heirloom.
